channel.title: Need advice on a pk server base
channel.description:
I'm going to create a pk server. What is the most recommended source to download from here to use for a pk server. This server should be *Stable *little to no lag *good pvp combat *hopefully have other skills working *nice looking *small files..ish *317 pref
Any suggestions?? opinions??
Thanks all! -Brynd63
